thread.title: Better sleep in 2026 starts here: Ozlo Sleepbuds are $75 off
thread.title_full: Better sleep in 2026 starts here: Ozlo Sleepbuds are $75 off

author: Kasey Caminiti
title: Better sleep in 2026 starts here: Ozlo Sleepbuds are $75 off
text:
Sleep better in 2026 with Ozlo Sleepbuds on sale for $75 off
Biometric sleep detection and a gentle in-ear alarm help you fall asleep faster and wake up better in 2026.
Kasey Caminiti
- Ozlo Sleepbuds are designed to improve sleep by blocking noise and playing neuroscience-backed soundscapes.
- The earbuds feature biometric sensors that detect sleep and adjust audio accordingly.
- Users can stream their own audio or use the device's library of intelligent soundscapes.
Want a wellness reset that delivers real results in 2026? Start with sleep. Better sleep can help boost mood, metabolism, stress resilience, cognitive performance, immune function and more. If you’re battling city noise, a snoring partner, menopause sleep struggles or general restlessness, Ozlo Sleepbuds are purpose-built to help you sleep deeper and wake up feeling more refreshed in 2026
New Year offer: $75 off Ozlo Sleepbuds now through January 16
Traditional earplugs dull noise and sound machines can help bathe you in generic audio but Ozlo Sleepbuds do both. These powerful little accessories passively block disruptive noise and layer in neuroscience-backed soundscapes designed for better sleep. That one-two punch helps you fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer, even in challenging environments.
Save now at Ozlo
Key features of Ozlo Sleepbuds:
- Clinically Proven Sleep Technology: Non-pharmaceutical, science-backed audio crafted to help users drift off and maintain sleep through typical disruptions.
- Noise-Masking Intelligence: Advanced passive and active noise-masking
replaces disruptive sounds(like snoring or traffic) with soothing audio engineered for sleep. - Biometric Sleep Detection: Onboard sensors detect when you fall asleep and transition from streaming to built-in soundscapes—so your audio adapts as you do.
- In-Ear Gentle Alarm: Wake up without jolting your nervous system (or your partner) thanks to a personalized in-ear alarm.
- All-Night Comfort: Ultra-soft, side-sleeper–approved silicone tips minimize pressure points—even if you change positions throughout the night.
- Streaming Flexibility:
Stream what works for you! Listen to meditation, audiobooks, white noise or calming playlists through your favorite apps. - Intelligent Soundscapes: A curated, evolving library designed by sleep scientists and audio engineers, tailored for rest.
- Long Battery Life: Up to 10+ hours of continuous play plus portable charging via the Smart Case.
- Peace of Mind Built In: Designed with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) and an optional offline mode that shuts off wireless communication overnight to minimize EMF exposure.
Buy now
USA TODAY Shopping will be covering all the best deals and drops, so be sure to sign up for text alerts, check us out on Flipboard, follow us on TikTok, sign up for our newsletter and follow us on Instagram to stay updated!
